title: HS India to Showcase Exclusive Bridal & Ethnic Collections at Delhi Expo 2025
content:
HS India, one of the country’s leading names in ethnic and bridal wear, is proud to announce its participation in the Delhi Fashion & Bridal Expo 2025.

The event, scheduled to take place at Pragati Maidan, New Delhi, from [25/Aug/2025], is one of the most anticipated showcases of the year for designers, retailers, and wholesalers in the Indian fashion industry. HS India will present its latest bridal lehengas, festive wear, and ready-to-ship ethnic collections, highlighting its unique blend of traditional Indian craftsmanship with contemporary design sensibilities.

“For us, fashion is more than fabric — it’s a feeling and a legacy. The Delhi Expo allows us to connect directly with resellers, retailers, and fashion enthusiasts who value authenticity and quality,” said Raghav Mittal, CEO at HS India.

At the expo, visitors can expect:

  1. Preview of the 2025 Bridal Collection featuring intricate zardozi, sequins, and pastel palettes.

  2. Exclusive Festive Wear Launches for upcoming wedding and festive seasons.

  3. Wholesale Opportunities for retailers looking to expand their ethnic wear collections globally.

HS India invites all fashion buyers, resellers, and enthusiasts to visit their stall 5 at the Delhi Expo 2025.

title: HS India Announces Grand Opening of New Flagship Store
content:
HS India is delighted to announce the grand opening of its new flagship store in Pitampura, marking a significant milestone in its journey to bring timeless ethnic and bridal fashion closer to customers.

Located at Pitampura, the new store is designed to offer a luxury shopping experience where brides, fashion lovers, and resellers can explore HS India’s signature collections in person.

The store will showcase:

  1. Bridal Lehengas that blend heritage embroidery with modern silhouettes.
  2. Festive & Ready-to-Wear Collections perfect for weddings, parties, and global events.
  3. Wholesale & Retail Facilities, enabling resellers to source collections directly.

“Opening this flagship store allows us to bring our legacy of craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities to a wider audience. Whether you are a bride looking for her dream outfit or a retailer sourcing wholesale ethnic wear, our new store is designed for you,” said Neeraj Mittal, Director at HS India.

The grand opening event will feature a special fashion showcase and exclusive previews of upcoming collections.
